channel.title: Security on Bits of Insight
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Bits of Insight

item.title: Shutting the ubiquitous backdoor
item.description: I believe resistance is futile if someone is bent on spying on you; there’re both serious and creative ways to go about it. Talking to your processor, behind your back, isn’t the primary or only means. Our’s is a golden age where corporates and government agencies stoop low enough to pry into bedrooms. Did you know that almost all machines1 you own have a processor aside from the one you paid for?
